mapper.sql: A.OS_ID, A.ORDER_ID, A.CO_VAT_NO, A.PO_ID, A.PO_DOMAIN, A.ITEM_TYPE, A.EQP_TYPE, A.EQP_MODEL, A.APL_DEPT, A.APL_USER, A.APL_TIME, A.OS_TIME, A.OS_DESC, A.AMOUNT, A.AP_USER, A.AP_AMOUNT, A.AP_DATE, A.PAY_NO, A.PAY_AMOUNT, A.PAY_FLG, A.STATUS, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, B.PO_NO, C.ORDER_DESC, D.SITE_ID, E.SITE_NAME, F.DOMAIN, J.CO_NAME, sum(cast(isnull(round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE), 0), 0) as numeric(18, 2))) TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT, sum(cast(isnull(round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE) * 0.05, 0), 0) as numeric(18, 2))) BUSINESS_TAX, sum(cast(isnull(round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE), 0) + round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE) * 0.05, 0), 0) as numeric(18, 2))) AP_AMT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING A left join TB_COM_PO_MAIN B on A.PO_ID = B.PO_ID left join TB_SITE_WORK_ORDER C on C.ORDER_ID = A.ORDER_ID left join TB_SITE_WORK D on D.WORK_ID = C.WORK_ID left join TB_SITE_MAIN E on E.SITE_ID = D.SITE_ID left join TB_COM_TOWN_DOMAIN_TEAM F on F.TOWN_ID = D.AREA left join TB_SITE_OS_ITEM G on G.OS_ID = A.OS_ID and G.PO_ID = A.PO_ID left join TB_COM_PO_ITEM H on H.PO_ID = G.PO_ID and H.ITEM_ID = G.ITEM_ID left join TB_COM_ITEM_MAIN I on I.ITEM_ID = G.ITEM_ID left join TB_COM_COMPANY J on J.CO_VAT_NO = A.CO_VAT_NO
group by A.OS_ID, A.ORDER_ID, A.CO_VAT_NO, A.PO_ID, A.PO_DOMAIN, A.ITEM_TYPE, A.EQP_TYPE, A.EQP_MODEL, A.APL_DEPT, A.APL_USER, A.APL_TIME, A.OS_TIME, A.OS_DESC, A.AMOUNT, A.AP_USER, A.AP_AMOUNT, A.AP_DATE, A.PAY_NO, A.PAY_AMOUNT, A.PAY_FLG, A.STATUS, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, B.PO_NO, C.ORDER_DESC, D.SITE_ID, E.SITE_NAME, F.DOMAIN, J.CO_NAME
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING A left join TB_COM_PO_MAIN B on A.PO_ID = B.PO_ID left join TB_SITE_WORK_ORDER C on A.ORDER_ID = C.ORDER_ID left join TB_SITE_WORK D on D.WORK_ID = C.WORK_ID left join TB_SITE_MAIN E on E.SITE_ID = D.SITE_ID left join TB_COM_TOWN_DOMAIN_TEAM F on F.TOWN_ID = D.AREA left join TB_SITE_OS_ITEM G on G.OS_ID = A.OS_ID and G.PO_ID = A.PO_ID left join TB_COM_PO_ITEM H on H.PO_ID = G.PO_ID and H.ITEM_ID = G.ITEM_ID left join TB_COM_ITEM_MAIN I on I.ITEM_ID = G.ITEM_ID left join TB_COM_COMPANY J on J.CO_VAT_NO = A.CO_VAT_NO where A.OS_ID = #{OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by A.OS_ID, A.ORDER_ID, A.CO_VAT_NO, A.PO_ID, A.PO_DOMAIN, A.ITEM_TYPE, A.EQP_TYPE, A.EQP_MODEL, A.APL_DEPT, A.APL_USER, A.APL_TIME, A.OS_TIME, A.OS_DESC, A.AMOUNT, A.AP_USER, A.AP_AMOUNT, A.AP_DATE, A.PAY_NO, A.PAY_AMOUNT, A.PAY_FLG, A.STATUS, A.CR_USER, A.CR_TIME, A.MD_USER, A.MD_TIME, B.PO_NO, C.ORDER_DESC, D.SITE_ID, E.SITE_NAME, F.DOMAIN, J.CO_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING (OS_ID, ORDER_ID, CO_VAT_NO, PO_ID, PO_DOMAIN, ITEM_TYPE, EQP_TYPE, EQP_MODEL, APL_DEPT, APL_USER, APL_TIME, OS_TIME, OS_DESC, AMOUNT, AP_USER, AP_AMOUNT, AP_DATE, PAY_NO, PAY_AMOUNT, STATUS, CR_USER, CR_TIME, MD_USER, MD_TIME, PAY_FLG) values (#{OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORDER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PO_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{PO_DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ITEM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EQP_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EQP_MODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APL_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APL_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APL_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{OS_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{OS_DESC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{AP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AP_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{PAY_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PAY_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{PAY_FLG,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING
OS_ID = #{record.OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{record.ORDER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_VAT_NO = #{record.CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_ID = #{record.PO_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PO_DOMAIN = #{record.PO_DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_TYPE = #{record.ITEM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQP_TYPE = #{record.EQP_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQP_MODEL = #{record.EQP_MODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APL_DEPT = #{record.APL_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APL_USER = #{record.APL_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APL_TIME = #{record.APL_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OS_TIME = #{record.OS_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OS_DESC = #{record.OS_DESC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{record.AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AP_USER = #{record.AP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AP_AMOUNT = #{record.AP_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AP_DATE = #{record.AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_NO = #{record.PAY_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_AMOUNT = #{record.PAY_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{record.STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_USER = #{record.CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_TIME = #{record.CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MD_USER = #{record.MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MD_TIME = #{record.MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_FLG = #{record.PAY_FLG,jdbcType=CHAR},

update TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING set OS_ID = #{record.OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{record.ORDER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_VAT_NO = #{record.CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_ID = #{record.PO_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PO_DOMAIN = #{record.PO_DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_TYPE = #{record.ITEM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_TYPE = #{record.EQP_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_MODEL = #{record.EQP_MODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APL_DEPT = #{record.APL_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APL_USER = #{record.APL_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APL_TIME = #{record.APL_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OS_TIME = #{record.OS_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OS_DESC = #{record.OS_DESC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{record.AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AP_USER = #{record.AP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AP_AMOUNT = #{record.AP_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AP_DATE = #{record.AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_NO = #{record.PAY_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_AMOUNT = #{record.PAY_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{record.STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_USER = #{record.CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_TIME = #{record.CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MD_USER = #{record.MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD_TIME = #{record.MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_FLG = #{record.PAY_FLG,jdbcType=CHAR}

update TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING
ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_VAT_NO = #{CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_ID = #{PO_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PO_DOMAIN = #{PO_DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_TYPE = #{ITEM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQP_TYPE = #{EQP_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQP_MODEL = #{EQP_MODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APL_DEPT = #{APL_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APL_USER = #{APL_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APL_TIME = #{APL_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OS_TIME = #{OS_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OS_DESC = #{OS_DESC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AP_USER = #{AP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AP_AMOUNT = #{AP_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AP_DATE = #{AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_NO = #{PAY_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_AMOUNT = #{PAY_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_USER = #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CR_TIME = #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MD_USER = #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MD_TIME = #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_FLG = #{PAY_FLG,jdbcType=CHAR},
where OS_ID = #{OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING set ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_VAT_NO = #{CO_VAT_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_ID = #{PO_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PO_DOMAIN = #{PO_DOMAIN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_TYPE = #{ITEM_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_TYPE = #{EQP_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQP_MODEL = #{EQP_MODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APL_DEPT = #{APL_DEPT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APL_USER = #{APL_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APL_TIME = #{APL_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OS_TIME = #{OS_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OS_DESC = #{OS_DESC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AP_USER = #{AP_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AP_AMOUNT = #{AP_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AP_DATE = #{AP_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_NO = #{PAY_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_AMOUNT = #{PAY_AMOUNT,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_USER = #{CR_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_TIME = #{CR_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MD_USER = #{MD_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MD_TIME = #{MD_TIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_FLG = #{PAY_FLG,jdbcType=CHAR} where OS_ID = #{OS_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING set ORDER_ID = #{orderId}, CO_VAT_NO = #{coVatNo}, PO_ID = #{poId}, PO_DOMAIN = #{poDomain}, EQP_TYPE = #{eqpType}, EQP_MODEL = #{eqpModel}, OS_DESC = #{osDesc}, MD_USER = #{mdUser}, MD_TIME = GETDATE(), AMOUNT = #{amount} where OS_ID = #{osId}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING (ORDER_ID, CO_VAT_NO, PO_ID, PO_DOMAIN, EQP_TYPE, EQP_MODEL, OS_DESC, CR_USER, CR_TIME, AMOUNT, OS_ID, STATUS, MD_USER, MD_TIME) values (#{orderId}, #{coVatNo}, #{poId}, #{poDomain}, #{eqpType}, #{eqpModel}, #{osDesc}, #{crUser}, GETDATE(), #{amount}, #{osId}, 'OS01', #{crUser}, GETDATE())
mapper.select: select ISNULL(sum(ISNULL(PAY_AMOUNT,0)),0) as PAY_AMOUNT from TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING where PO_ID = #{poId} AND STATUS NOT IN ('OS01', 'OS03', 'OS07', 'OS08')

select sum(cast(isnull(round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE), 0), 0) as numeric(18, 2))) TAX_EXCLUSIVE_AMT, sum(cast(isnull(round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE) * 0.05, 0), 0) as numeric(18, 2))) BUSINESS_TAX, sum(cast(isnull(round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE), 0) + round(H.PRICE * G.AP_NUMBER * (1 + I.MGR_FEE) * 0.05, 0), 0) as numeric(18, 2))) AP_AMT from TB_SITE_OUTSOURCING A left join TB_COM_PO_MAIN B on A.PO_ID = B.PO_ID left join TB_SITE_WORK_ORDER C on A.ORDER_ID = C.ORDER_ID left join TB_SITE_WORK D on D.WORK_ID = C.WORK_ID left join TB_SITE_MAIN E on E.SITE_ID = D.SITE_ID left join TB_COM_TOWN_DOMAIN_TEAM F on F.TOWN_ID = D.AREA left join TB_SITE_OS_ITEM G on G.OS_ID = A.OS_ID and G.PO_ID = A.PO_ID left join TB_COM_PO_ITEM H on H.PO_ID = G.PO_ID and H.ITEM_ID = G.ITEM_ID left join TB_COM_ITEM_MAIN I on I.ITEM_ID = G.ITEM_ID
